Serving Our Community One Family at a Time

  • In-Home & School-Based Services - Intensive In Home counselors provide clinical intervention and support services to youth.

  • Community Services and Mental Health Support Services - ICOS works to support individuals to help maintain and enhance their lives.

  • Intensive Community Outreach Services - Bring awareness to your cause with style and function.

Join Our Family

ICOS is dedicated to assisting adults with mental illness work toward greater independence.

Intensive Community Outreach Services (ICOS) works to support individuals in an effort to help maintain and enhance their level of functioning in the home and community.

0

We strive to provide our clients with peace of mind through industry best practices.

Ethics, character and values are what we are about at ICOS.

We remain loyal to our clients as we assist them to reach their life goals.

Here at ICOS everyone is treated as family.

Service Offerings

  • Individualized Clinical Assessments and Treatment Planning
  • Communication and Social Skills Building
  • Mental Health Symptoms Management
  • 24-hour Emergency Response
  • Functional and Daily Living Skills Building
  • Coordination with Other Service Providers and Professionals

Service Locations

ICOS is dedicated to assisting adolescents and adults with mental illness through working toward greater independence.
